All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Camp
Camp class represents a camp event.
CampEditor
Represents an editor interface for managing camps.
CampFilter
Represents a filter for camps based on various criteria.
CampManager
CampManager class is responsible for managing camps and their operations.
CampRegister
Represents a register interface for students to interact with camps.
CampReportGenerator
CampReportGenerator class is responsible for generating and writing camp reports to files.
CampReportGenerator.WriteOption
Enumeration representing the write options for generating camp reports.
CampSaver
CampSaver class is responsible for saving and loading camp data to/from a file.
CampView
CampView class is responsible for displaying camp-related information and user prompts.
CommitteeReportGenerator
Used to generate the performance report for the camp committee by the staff Used to trace how much points the committee member have achieved
Enquiry
Enquiry raised by the students contains the attributes of an enquiry
EnquiryManager
This class serves as an abstraction that handles the reading of data from enquiries.txt Database
EnquiryTextDB
Read and Write to enquiries.txt Database Inherits from TextDB from the utils package
EnquiryView
Display the enquiry menu for Student and Staff Uses polymorphism where the the Student/Staff is passed into the user parameter based on the object passed decide if the user is a staff or student call the corresponding menu for the different type of user
InputValidator
Verify the input keyed in by the user.
LoginManager
Handles the login feature of a user.
OperationResult
Verify the output of the operations.
PasswordManager
Handles the changing of password.
PasswordManagerInterface
The PasswordManager Interface used as an abstraction to passwordManager Implemented by PasswordManager.
Staff
Represent a staff in NTU The Staff class inherited from User Class contains the attributes of the staff
StaffManager
This class serves as an abstraction that handles the reading of data from Staff.txt Database
StaffTextDB
Read and Write to Student.txt Database Inherits from TextDB from the utility package
Student
Represent a Student in NTU The Student class inherited from User Class contains the attributes of the student.
StudentManager
This class serves as an abstraction that handles the reading of data from Student.txt Database
StudentTextDB
Read and Write to Student.txt Database Inherits from TextDB from the utility package
Suggestion
Suggestion provided by the camp comittee member contains the attributes of a suggestion
SuggestionManager
This class serves as an abstraction that handles the reading of data from suggestions.txt Database
SuggestionTextDB
Read and Write to suggestions.txt Database Inherits from TextDB from the utils package
SuggestionView
Display the suggestion menu for Student and Staff Uses polymorphism where the the Student/Staff is passed into the user parameter based on the object passed decide if the user is a staff or student call the corresponding menu for the different type of user
TestApp
Main of our system Used to display the main menu after logging in successfully Calles different manager to handles the different options on the menu
TextDB<T>
Abstract class TextDB, inherited by other TextDB classes to read and write to database
User
Represent a User of the CAMs app contains the attributes, mutator and accessor of a user
